person.persName: Samuel K. Hays (Kenton County, Kentucky, carriage maker and soldier - QM 2nd Ky. Inf. (C.S.A.))

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, carriage maker and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Howard Hays. Father of Eliza Hays and Herman Hays. Carriage maker in Kenton County in 1860. Served in the 2nd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a captain, major, and chief quartermaster from July 19, 1861.
